title: Destination management company in Seychelles wins TripAdvisor’s Certificate of ExcellenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Destination management company in Seychelles wins TripAdvisor’s Certificate of Excellence Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
The Mason’s Travel (Pty) Ltd, a destination management company in Seychelles has won a Certificate of Excellence from TripAdvisor for its day excursions.
This certificate is a prestigious award earned through the positive reviews from those who have used this service.
Mason’s Travel is a local tourism company that has been contributing in the tourism industry of Seychelles for over four decades.
Talking about this achievement, the company’s managing director Alan Mason said the winning this Certificate of Excellence from TripAdvisor, highlights the fantastic teamwork and high service delivery that has been synonymous with the Mason’s Travel brand for more than 40 years.
“For this, our company continues to be recognised as the leading inbound tour operator for the Seychelles. We can all be proud of this achievement, especially as it is made more noteworthy by the fact that it is our very own clients that have taken the time to share their experience and appreciation for our services. My congratulations and appreciation go to the whole Mason’s team as well as to our many partners throughout the islands. It is through the collective efforts of everyone involved that we have been able to achieve this recognition – one not just for Mason’s Travel but for Seychelles tourism” Alan Mason said.
Alain St.Ange, the Seychelles Minister responsible for Tourism and Culture was joined by Sherin Naiken, the CEO of the Tourism Board of the islands to express their joy in hearing that a local Destination Management Company had been recognized for its service for day excursions. “Seychelles is blessed with diversity and the mix of islands so close opens the door for day excursions with a difference. We often hear of talks on yield from our tourism industry, that industry that remains the pillar of our country’s economy. This is why our country needs to now prioritize development of unique Seychelles products. Mason’s Travel recognition is an achievement, but we take this opportunity to appeal to all tourism players that’s involved on-the-ground development to spend time to develop more Seychelles tours and excursions that will showcase our uniqueness. Bring out our culture, find Made in Seychelles Artisans, showcase our unique flora and fauna that lies off the beaten track. We shall support you by making sure that your efforts are not only recognized, but made visible to our visitors” Minister Alain St.Ange said.
Source:- Seychelles Tourism
